John Horton Conway has died. Sigh. One of the most unique mathematicians and human beings who ever lived. Five years ago he was game for this April Fool's prank https://blogs.scientificamerican.com/guest-blog/john-conway-reminiscences-about-dr-matrix-and-bourbaki/

- Card Colm Mulcahy (@CardColm)
Very sad news. The first math book I ever bought was Conway and Guy's "The Book of Numbers". This also reminds me that I should get back to reviewing #1540...
